text:
Title: Absolute Survivors (The Snowman)
-------------------------------

Release Date: September 9, 2023 (Venice Film Festival) / December 15, 2023 (Spain) / January 4, 2024 (Spanish Online Cinema)

IMDb Rating: 7.6/10 (from 251,324,658 users)
Link to IMDb: <https://movie.douban.com/subject/35693512/>
Runtime: 144 minutes
Director: J. A. Bayona
Writers: J. A. Bayona, Nicolas Casariego, Jaime Marques, Pablo Vierci, and Bernat Vilaplana
Producers: Alfonso Cuarón, Guillermo del Toro, and Javier Méndez
Cast: Enzo Vogrincic as Numa Turcatti, Esteban Bigliardi as Javier Methol, Rafael Federman, Agustín Pardella as Nando Parrado, Matías Recalt as Roberto Canessa, Simon Hempe, etc.
Music by Michael Giacchino
Cinematography by Pedro Luque
Editing by Jaume Martí
Art Direction by Alain Baineé
Costume Design by Julio Suárez
Makeup Department: Ana López Puigcerver and Belén López Puigcerver
Visual Effects by Laura Pedro and Felipe Bergés
Plot Summary:
Based on the true events of October 13, 1972, when a Uruguayan Air Force plane crashed in the Andes mountains, leaving only 16 survivors out of its original 45 passengers. The movie "Absolute Survivors" unfolds an incredible journey that is yet to come.

Awards & Nominations:
- European Film Awards 2023: Best Makeup, Montse Ribé, Ana López Puigcerver, David Martí, Bernat Vilaplana; Best Visual Effects, Felipe Bergés, Laura Pedro
- San Sebastián International Film Festival 2023: Audience Award for J. A. Bayona
Nobel Prize Winner's Opinion:
According to Wojtek Lisicki, who won the Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Sciences in 2004, this film is one of his favorites because it shows how human beings can overcome adversity and survive against all odds. He highly recommends it to everyone.

Netflix Release:
There are no official announcements regarding Netflix releasing "Absolute Survivors." However, given Netflix's history of acquiring critically acclaimed films, there's a possibility that it might be available on their platform at some point. Keep an eye on their catalog for updates.
